title: Quick sweet gammon with stir-fry vegetables
description: Five-spice adds a burst of flavour to this quick and easy midweek gammon dish that can be made in only 15 minutes.

method.Step 1: Season the gammon steaks and dust with a good pinch of Chinese five-spice powder. Heat the olive oil in a pan over a medium-high heat, add the steaks and cook for 3 minutes each side, until the rind is crisp.

method.Step 2: Add the honey, Bonne Maman Mandarin Marmalade and a squeeze of lime to the pan. Bubble for a couple of minutes, turning the steaks until coated, sticky and cooked through. Remove to a plate to rest.

method.Step 3: Pour another tbsp olive oil into the pan, add the mixed stir-fry vegetables and the red cabbage, shredded. Cook for 2 minutes, then stir through the white wine vinegar, caster sugar and a good squeeze of lime.

method.Step 4: Season and toss around the pan for 1 minute. Spoon between plates, serve the gammon steaks alongside and garnish with extra lime wedges.
